DeliveryTask.name: DeliveryTask
DeliveryTask.description: Represents information about shipments and orders to be delivered to a store in a visit.

AssessmentTaskId.description: ID of the associated assessment task.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this record.

PlaceId.description: Location to which delivery is to be made.

Status.description: User defined status of the delivery task.

VisitId.description: ID of the visit associated with the delivery task
